1692220.name: Sneezeman: Escape From Planet Sneeze
1692220.description:
Sneezeman: Escape From Planet Sneeze is a 2D action-platform-adventure. Guide Sneezeman to a safe exit and evade spiky spores, defeat bad guys, collect all the pills, discover secret chambers, outrun a thunderous particle cloud and beat the clock. It's hard as nails and classic arcade-style fun.

Sneezeman is packed with a huge range of challenges and 4 worlds to overcome - clobber the villainous underbelly within 'Urban', conquer the bestial perils of ‘Jungle’, vanquish the spine tingling terrors within ‘Haunted’, and eliminate the alien threat upon ‘Mars’.

You'll need next level gaming skills to help our hapless hero escape and achieve a best time!

Will you be quick enough to save Sneezeman and return order to the Sneeze-verse?

Good luck and bless you (you're going to need it)!

* Fast paced platforming game play *
* Escape the evil clutches of the ‘sneeze cloud’ *
* Outwit zombies, ghosts, rats, robbers, aliens, tigers and more *
* Amazing worlds; Jungle, Haunted, Urban, Mars *
* 40 levels of contagious chaos *
* Play as Horseman, Nyan, Zombie and other collectible characters. *
* Discover all the secret caches *
* Test your Sneeze in a fun mini game *
* Spin the Wheel of Fortune *
* Beat the best level times *
* Comedic narrative & epic soundtrack *

**New worlds, Boss levels & multiplayer coming soon!**

(c) 2023 50000 Leagues Ltd & Modern Toss Ltd. All Rights Reserved.

'Sneezeman' is a registered trademark.

For further information contact info@50000leagues.com

www.sneezeman.com
twitter - @sneezemangame
